com.project.uoft.thermostat_interface

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.uoft.thermostat_interface.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class encapsulates Firebase database related methods.

    • Method Detail

      • writeNewAction

        public static void writeNewAction(java.lang.String UID,
                                  java.util.Date timeStamp,
                                  Action newAction)
        It writes a user action to the Firebase database.
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
        timeStamp - Time of the action.
        newAction - An Action object that contains information about the user action.

      • writeNewUser

        public static void writeNewUser(java.lang.String UID,
                                User newUser)
        It writes a new user to the Firebase database.
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
        newUser - A User object that contains information about the user.

      • writeACPower

        public static void writeACPower(java.lang.String UID,
                                java.lang.Double acPower)
        It writes the AC power to the Firebase database
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID
        acPower - AC power in kW

      • writeHeatPower

        public static void writeHeatPower(java.lang.String UID,
                                  java.lang.Double heatPower)
        It writes the Heating power to the Firebase database
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
        heatPower - Heating power in kW.

      • writeFeedback

        public static void writeFeedback(java.lang.String UID,
                                 java.util.Date timeStamp,
                                 java.lang.String message)
        It writes the feedback message left by the user to the Firebase database.
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
        timeStamp - The time when message is sent.
        message - Feedback message.

      • writeUserSelectedUI

        public static void writeUserSelectedUI(java.lang.String UID,
                                       java.lang.String userSelectedUI)
        It writes the user selected UI mode from the ui_picker_spinner to the Firebase database.
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
        userSelectedUI - user selected UI mode from the ui_picker_spinner (default, 0,1,2). default means the user allows the UI being remotely modified by the firebase server.

      • getUserSelectedUI

        public static void getUserSelectedUI(java.lang.String UID)
        It retrieves the user_selected_ui_mode parameter from the Firebase database.
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID.
